item.description:
I have booked Bellini's for Sat., March 8th. We will meet in the bar area - just to gather and say hello before dinner. We will be eating in the Wine Room.

authentic Italian... serious wine"
An authentic Italian eatery that boasts a serious wine collection. From upscale professionals and couples, to families and friends, Bellini's offers an uncompromised dining experience. This popular eatery offers a true classic experience with rich mahogany accents, state of the art interior and superior service.


I had to put down a 100.00 deposit that they will take off the bill for the room. Please Please Please if you change your mind let me know at least 2 days before Things do come up I do understand that. I will send out my Cell # to people who have RSVP'd Yes

http://www.eatdrinkbe....
item.how_to_find_us: We will meetup in the bar around 6:30 pm and a balloon will mark out tables,
item.why: We have a great group - membership just keeps growing! I know you will meet many new friends and, hopefully, we will all enjoy a good meal.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Bellini's Italian Eatery, 538 Evergreen Way, S. Windsor - Sat., Mar, 8 - 7 pm
